Articles.Content:
Is it possible to move the destroy vessel button ? It is at the exact same spot as the "center view" button (not sure of the names, my game is in French), or just make it red ?
I've already destroy several ships by mistake...

Cheers to the devs !

I agree with making it look different, especially as its right next to the other buttons (like control/focus)

I also think this should only appear in the tracking station and for debris.
Or at the very least “This crewed/probe vessel is about to be destroyed. Please confirm Y/N.”
